name: Bit Bamboo
description:
Save the village of Hokkaido. The local botanist has grown ill and they need your help to grow bamboo.

Research new strains and purchase root ties to apply them.

Take active care of your bamboo. Head to the waters edge and keep the soil moist. 

Enjoy the simple but elegant environment. Watch the birds fly by and the fish swim. And take cover during rainstorms.
